name: Bouncy Doggy - Drawing Action Game
description:
Mission you were given is
"Draw a Line, Lead a Dog".

Collect coins and complete many characters and obstacles
A new world awaits you for each character!

You can play this game with 2 mode,
Classic mode - "Disappears when hitting the drawn line" ,
Snake mode - "Drawed line starts to move"

From Japan, a new sense endless action game.
